name: Priority: Must have (vital) [Critical]
description: critical to the current delivery timebox in order for it to be a success

name: Priority: Should have (essential) [High]
description: important but not necessary for delivery in the current delivery timebox

name: Priority: Could have (confort) [Medium]
description: desirable but not necessary and could improve the user experience or customer satisfaction for a lit

name: Priority: Won't have (luxe) [Low]
description: Not planned into the schedule for the next delivery timebox

name: Status: Abandoned
description: The issue or Pull Request is wontfix

name: Status: Blocked
description: Progress on the issue is Blocked

name: Status: On Hold
description: Lacks enough info to make progress

name: Type: Refactoring
description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

name: Type: Testing
description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
